metadata.title: CVE-2016-3170 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The "have you forgotten your password" links in the User module in Drupal7.x before 7.43 and 8.x before 8.0.4 allow remote attackers to obtainsensitive username information by leveraging a configuration that permitsusing an email address to login and a module that permits logging in.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3170` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.43-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.43-1').
